title: Bellator Dublin: Sinead Kavanagh claims gritty win over Leah McCourt
description: Ireland's Sinead Kavanagh claims a gritty win over Leah McCourt in Dublin despite injuring her knee in the first round.

title: Ukraine: What happens next?
description: The gloves are off - so what might happen next? What can the West do to deter Vladimir Putin?

title: Families escaping conflict in Ukraine arrive in Poland
description: One family included a 10-year-old child, who has been travelling with her mother from Kyiv for two days.

title: 'Hank the Tank': DNA evidence spares 500lb burglar bear
description: Genetic samples show the 500lb bear linked to more than two dozen home break-ins... did not act alone.

title: Birmingham pub bombings: Fight over 'confession' to Chris Mullin
description: West Midlands Police has launched a legal bid to force journalist Chris Mullin to reveal sources.

title: Scottish Tory leader Douglas Ross faces no action over undeclared earnings
description: A watchdog finds the Scottish Tory leader did not "deliberately attempt to mislead" over his earnings.

title: Ukraine conflict: BP under pressure to sell stake in Russian firm
description: The oil giant's boss is warned of UK government concerns about its "overexposure to Russian interests".

title: Ukrainians in the UK: 'My dad refused safety, he will protect the land'
description: UK-based Ukrainians tell of fears for their homeland's future and their attempts to help from afar.

title: Ukraine crisis: Missile strikes, tanks and buildings hit in Kyiv
description: Russia continues its full-scale assault on Ukraine, with troops said to be in the capital.

title: Ukraine invasion: UK troops will not fight against Russia says Wallace
description: The defence secretary says Britain will not be "directly" involved but is supporting Ukraine forces.

title: West Ham draw Sevilla in Europa League as Rangers face Red Star Belgrade
description: Scottish champions Rangers will face Serbia's Red Star Belgrade in the Europa League last-16 while West Ham play Sevilla.

title: Russia bans British airlines from its airspace
description: Russia says the move is a response to the UK's 'unfriendly' decision to ban Aeroflot from the UK.

title: Ukraine conflict: Kyiv braces for Russian assault
description: The Ministry of Defence made the call as Russian forces reached the northern outskirts of Kyiv.

title: Ukraine: Kyiv residents spend night sheltering in basements and metro stations
description: Ukrainians tell the BBC how they spent the night sheltering from explosions and missile strikes.

title: Reid Steele: Mother Natalie Steele admits killing son, 2
description: Natalie Steele, 32, pleads guilty to manslaughter of Reid, who died after he was submerged in water.

title: Russia stripped of Champions League final
description: The 2022 Champions League final will be played in Paris after Russia was stripped of the match following the nation's invasion of Ukraine.

title: Ukraine invasion: Charities urge UK to welcome thousands of refugees
description: Charities say the UK should play a leading role, as the UN warns five million people could be displaced.

title: 'Women's World Cup unlikely to be Covid-free'
description: England captain Heather Knight says the Women's World Cup is unlikely to be "Covid-free" as New Zealand sees a surge in the Omicron variant.

title: Oil rises as Russia invasion nears Ukraine capital
description: The price of oil climbs back above $100 a barrel on renewed fears over supply constraints.

title: Russian forces seize Chernobyl nuclear power plant
description: The power plant, the site of a 1986 nuclear disaster, has been taken over by Russian troops.

title: Sally Kellerman: Oscar-nominated M*A*S*H actress dies at 84
description: Sally Kellerman played "Hot Lips" Houlihan in Robert Altman's 1970 film, set in the Korean war.

title: Storm Eunice: O2 Arena reopens after Storm damage
description: A hole in the London venue's fabric, which was shredded by winds, will be visible for some time.

title: Liverpool: Is this Jurgen Klopp's strongest squad?
description: Liverpool are preparing to face European champions Chelsea in Sunday's Carabao Cup final with arguably their strongest squad under manager Jurgen Klopp.

title: 'The transfer ban was the best thing' - how Chelsea's youth have gone from 'mannequins' to key players
description: Chelsea youth hopefuls used to have to go elsewhere for first-team football - but now have several academy graduates in their squad, including Mason Mount and Reece James. So what changed?

title: The Papers: 'A dark day for Europe' as Putin invades
description: The papers see echoes of World War Two and its aftermath as Russia launches an assault on Ukraine.

title: Football Focus: Jadon Sancho learning from 'magician' Cristiano Ronaldo
description: Manchester United's Jadon Sancho tells Football Focus that he was initially "stunned" to become a team-mate of Cristiano Ronaldo and describes the Portugal forward as "a magician".

title: The Duke: Why my family stole a masterpiece portrait
description: The real-life family secrets behind the new Jim Broadbent and Dame Helen Mirren film The Duke.

title: Risk of vaccine side-effects vanishingly small, a year on
description: Despite concerns over Covid vaccines, most side effects occur with hours or weeks of having a jab.

title: Covid: Millions of vaccine doses destroyed in England
description: Nearly two million were AstraZeneca shots that advisers said should not be given to younger adults.

title: Rape cases should be tried in specialist courts, says report
description: Watchdogs say rape victims are being failed by a system beset by delays and poor communication.

title: Noor Muqaddam: The high society beheading that stunned a nation
description: The murder of Noor Muqaddam by the son of one of Pakistan's richest families stunned the country.

title: Hair salon for autistic children opens in Sheffield
description: A salon in Sheffield opens a new sensory room with toys and special equipment.

title: Ukraine invaded: Anti-war protests in Russian cities lead to arrests
description: Russian police make hundreds of arrests after crowds demonstrate in support of Ukraine.

title: How Taiwan used simple tech to help contain Covid-19
description: The low-tech approach that helped Taiwan efficiently fight off coronavirus.
